body_html: I was originally going to postpone/not do it at all, until I got to the section of Pytorch that serialized data. There's one section that writes the tensor dimensions to a file using longs. I was worried about compatibility problems/more complicated code to deal with the different sizes.
body_text: I was originally going to postpone/not do it at all, until I got to the section of Pytorch that serialized data. There's one section that writes the tensor dimensions to a file using longs. I was worried about compatibility problems/more complicated code to deal with the different sizes.
body: I was originally going to postpone/not do it at all, until I got to the section of Pytorch that serialized data. There's one section that writes the tensor dimensions to a file using longs. I was worried about compatibility problems/more complicated code to deal with the different sizes.
